articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: Google brings its AI-powered marketing tools to India after ‘Google tax’ repeal - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has launched a suite of its AI-powered advertising tools in India, which debuted in the U.S. in May, as the repeal of the so-called "Google tax"
articles.content: Google has launched a suite of its AI-powered advertising tools in India, which debuted in the U.S. in May, as the repeal of the so-called “Google tax” has made the South Asian market more attractive… [+4116 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Report: Apple M4, more comfortable strap will headline first major Vision Pro update - Ars Technica
articles.description: Iterative update will supposedly be a bridge to a later, more extensive redesign.
